    class Produce::AvailableDefaultLanguages

    all_languages() click to toggle source

    If you update this list, you probably also have to update these files:

    • fastlane_core/lib/fastlane_core/languages.rb

    • spaceship/lib/assets/languageMapping.json

    See this pull request for example: github.com/fastlane/fastlane/pull/14110

    # File produce/lib/produce/available_default_languages.rb, line 7
def self.all_languages
  [
